text: Good afternoon, I have sent [redacted_name] home with a student daily planning sheet. I have a challenge with her focus and maintaining her academic balance. We have reset all her due dates because of general conference, however she is still not keeping up to date and on schedule. I have reassigned some of the work she had done last year just so she is able to review and relearn what has been done many months ago. If you have any questions or concerns please call, email or text me. If you‚Äôd like to meet I am open to that as well. My main concern and goal is that Keren pushes to her full potential and is able to complete 7th -8th grade assignments. Have a blessed evening! üòä
